data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This name is been chosen after a lot of discussions and among many
    other names to express what will the module will do, the definition
    of the word Rills on wikipedia made us take this decision and even
    we registered the domains rills.net and rills.org for that module.
    Our new Rills module which is widget based RAD (rapid application
    development) or MCV for Perl developers is an easy to use web
    applications using widgets and gadgets and short urls.
